name: Curve alUSD-FRAXBP Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains FRAXBP (FRAX, USDC) and alUSD, a soft-pegged dollar synthetic debt asset via Alchemix.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains FRAXBP (FRAX, USDC) and alUSD, a soft-pegged dollar synthetic debt asset via Alchemix.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains FRAXBP (FRAX, USDC) and alUSD, a soft-pegged dollar synthetic debt asset via Alchemix.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los medidores de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC y renBTC) y oBTC, un ERC-20 respaldado por BTC nativo a través de BoringDAO.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains FRAXBP (FRAX, USDC) and alUSD, a soft-pegged dollar synthetic debt asset via Alchemix.

pt.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains FRAXBP (FRAX, USDC) and alUSD, a soft-pegged dollar synthetic debt asset via Alchemix.

el.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains FRAXBP (FRAX, USDC) and alUSD, a soft-pegged dollar synthetic debt asset via Alchemix.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu meta havuzu, sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC ve renBTC) ve BoringDAO aracılığıyla yerel BTC tarafından desteklenen bir ERC-20 olan oBTC'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains FRAXBP (FRAX, USDC) and alUSD, a soft-pegged dollar synthetic debt asset via Alchemix.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含元池代币 sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) 和 oBTC，oBTC 是以 BTC 做资产支持的 ERC20 代币，由 BoringDAO 发行。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve तरलता पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस मेटापूल में sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, और renBTC) और oBTC, एक ERC-20 है, जो BoringDAO के माध्यम से देशी BTC द्वारा समर्थित है।
